TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
40 yards.

Wait... what?

I am the 268th most repped person on the forums, with 55 rep til my next rank.

As of this post, I also happen to be the 510th most prolific poster on the forums.
I have no idea.

> 
> I have no idea.

As of this writing, you are 51 points away from your next reputation rank.

I am 48 points away from my first light-green bar.

Happy landings!
getting close it seems...

> 
> I am 48 points away from my first light-green bar.
> 
> Happy landings!

48? I'm only 149 away from my first Light-Green bar!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-22T00:22:35Z" title="10/22/2015 12:22  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 22, 2015</time> by Dman979**
I think 60 rep points.
wow... only 7 points away... guess it's time to do something cool! hehehe
im currently at 199 rep points. Literally a bugs crawl away from three bars.
nvm i just got repped xD
How do I get rep and how do I tell what my rep bar is at?
Im at 25 points

> 
> How do I get rep and how do I tell what my rep bar is at?

You get rep by posting things that people like. You can see your rep total by viewing your profile, link is on the upper right of every forum page.

Another 55 and I will have my third bar. Only wish the Star Destroyer came with it...

![imperial_officer_1.jpg](http://www.shadowdalecreations.com/imperial_officer_1.jpg)
Now you guys bumped me up to 31 points,thanks

Moar rep is needed...

60 more I believe.
I think you guys love me or something because I got 35 points

All I want is love with rep!

- - - Updated - - -

Is there a thred where I check how much I would need per bar

Rep spreading is real here!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> All I want is love with rep!
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Is there a thred where I check how much I would need per bar

Just check the reputation tab in your profile, I believe it's 100 rep for the second bar.

> 
> Rep spreading is real here!

is it every 25 rep you get a bar? also how do I get a light green bar

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-24T00:40:04Z" title="10/24/2015 12:40  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 24, 2015</time> by Red Iron Crown**
  
Don't do that.
Asking for rep is the best way not to get any...
Wow... I only said I was getting close, and next thing I know I'm getting a few freebies... thank's whoever you are!

> 
> also how do I get a light green bar

You get a light-green bar by getting 500 rep points.
